abilities: Boss Damage +10% / Meso Obtained / Item Drop Rate +15%

innerAbility.name: Regions w/ AS8 Cap
abilities: Damage to Abnormal Status +8% / Attack +21 / Meso Obtained / Item Drop Rate +15%

buffInfo.knockback: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/rush.png} tip={Rush (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} dur={[18s](120s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Warrior to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Warrior' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Warrior and talk to Dances with Balrog to accept a quest called 'The 3 Ways of the Warrior'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Spearman and you will be on the path to a Dark Knight. Spearman is the 2nd job of Dark Knight

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/warrior/war-leap-1.png} tip={War Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/warrior/iron-body.png} tip={Iron Body}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/warrior/warrior-mastery.png} tip={Warrior Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/warrior/slash-blast.png} tip={Slash Blast}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/warrior/upward-charge-1.png} tip={Upward Charge}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/weapon-mastery.png} tip={Weapon Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/agile-arms.png} tip={Agile Arms}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/hyper-body.png} tip={Hyper Body}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/iron-will.png} tip={Iron Will}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/spear-sweep.png} tip={Spear Sweep}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye-shock.png} tip={Evil Eye Shock}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/cross-surge.png} tip={Cross Surge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/lord-of-darkness.png} tip={Lord of Darkness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/hex-of-the-evil-eye.png} tip={Hex of the Evil Eye}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/endure.png} tip={Endure}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye-of-domination.png} tip={Evil Eye of Domination}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye-shock-ii.png} tip={Evil Eye Shock II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/la-mancha-spear.png} tip={La Mancha Spear}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/rush.png} tip={Rush}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/barricade-mastery.png} tip={Barricade Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/final-pact.png} tip={Final Pact}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/revenge-of-the-evil-eye.png} tip={Revenge of the Evil Eye}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/power-stance.png} tip={Power Stance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/dark-impale.png} tip={Dark Impale}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/gungnirs-descent.png} tip={Gungnir's Descent}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/magic-crash.png} tip={Magic Crash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/dark-resonance.png} tip={Dark Resonance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/final-pact-damage.png} tip={Final Pact - Damage}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/final-pact-critical-chance.png} tip={Final Pact - Critical Chance}> Final Pact - Damage and Critical Chance_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye-hex-reinforce.png} tip={Evil Eye - Hex Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye-reinforce.png} tip={Evil Eye - Reinforce}> Evil Eye - Hex Reinforce and Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/gungnirs-descent-reinforce.png} tip={Gungnir's Descent - Reinforce}> Gungnir's Descent - Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/nightshade-explosion.png} tip={Nightshade Explosion (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/gungnirs-descent.png} tip={Gungnir's Descent (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye.png} tip={Evil Eye (2nd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/dark-impale.png} tip={Dark Impale (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/rush.png} tip={Leap Attack (1st Job), Rush (3rd Job), and Upward Charge (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack (2nd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/spear-sweep.png} tip={Spear Sweep (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye.png} tip={Evil Eye (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/la-mancha-spear.png} tip={La Mancha Spear (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/rush.png} tip={Leap Attack (1st Job), Rush (3rd Job), and Upward Charge (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/dark-impale.png} tip={Dark Impale (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/gungnirs-descent.png} tip={Gungnir's Descent (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/nightshade-explosion.png} tip={Nightshade Explosion (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to DiXiMaN, Moobs, and the Dark Knight Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Slash Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Damage: 335%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slash forward at multiple enemies

primary.name: War Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Upward Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 304%.
primary.desc: Launch up into the air
details: Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together<bp_Right-clicking the skill will lock it, preventing input activation_>

primary.name: Leap Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Dive downwards towards nearby platforms below
details: Can only be used while in the air
Use the Left or Right Arrow Keys to dive towards the given direction
Can also be activated by pressing the Down, Left, or Right Arrow Key and Attack Key together

primary.name: Iron Body
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +200, Max HP: +20%, Damage Taken: -10%

primary.name: Warrior Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Speed: 22, Jump: 10, Max Speed: 20, Max HP Per Level: 20, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Spear Sweep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 105%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Hits: 4\nHit enemies are pulled and stunned.
primary.desc: Strike forward while pulling in enemies and stunning them

primary.name: Evil Eye
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, casts heal that restores 20 HP every 24 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, summons an Evil Eye that regularly heals you

primary.name: Evil Eye Shock
primary.shortDesc: The Evil Eye appears in front of you, attacking up to 10 enemies 6 times, dealing 150% damage with a 45% chance of stunning targets for 5 sec.\nCooldown: 12 sec.
primary.desc: Evil Eye releases a shock in front of you
details: Attack has a chance to stun enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Hyper Body
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max HP and Max MP: +60%, Duration: 200 sec

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Spear and Polearm Mastery: +50%\nAttack Speed +1, Damage +5% when equipped with a Spear.

primary.name: Agile Arms
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 80% Final Attack damage 2 time(s).
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: La Mancha Spear
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 29, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10
primary.desc: Strike forward

primary.name: Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Pushed: 12
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies
details: While dashing, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Cross Surge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Increases Final Damage by up to 20% for 200 sec. This number decreases in proportion to your HP when your current HP is less than 50% of your Max HP.\nDamage Taken is reduced by 8% of your missing HP, up to a maximum of 4000.\n[Passive Effect] - Final Damage: +50%]
primary.desc: Increases %Final Damage based on your current %HP
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage
Additionally while active, increases %Damage Reduction based on your missing HP

primary.name: Evil Eye of Domination
primary.shortDesc: An Evil Eye roams around freely, attacking nearby enemies with 210% damage.
primary.desc: Evil Eye will periodically attack a single enemy
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Evil Eye Shock II
primary.shortDesc: The Evil Eye appears in front of you, attacking up to 10 enemies 6 times, dealing 215% damage with a 90% chance to stun targets for 5 sec.\nCooldown: 12 sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Increases the chance to stun enemies hit

primary.name: Hex of the Evil Eye
primary.shortDesc: Frequency: every 4 sec, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +40, DEF: +500, Critical Rate: +10%. Buff Duration: 100 sec\nBuff effects are halved for party members
primary.desc: Evil Eye will periodically buff you and party members granting flat Attack and DEF and increasing %Crit Rate
details: Effects are halved for party members

primary.name: Lord of Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +8%\n100% chance to recover 2% of Max HP during the attack.

primary.name: Endure
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +20, Elemental Resistance: +20%

primary.name: Gungnir's Descent
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 49, Damage: 225%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 12.\nWhen Attacking: Damage increases by 110% of Max HP for every attack, Enemy Defense Ignored: 30%.
primary.desc: Casts giant spears to strike down on enemies
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and deals increased %Damage based on your Max HP

primary.name: Dark Impale
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Strike forward consecutively damaging multiple enemies

primary.name: Accept Final Pact
primary.shortDesc: Use the arrows key within 5 sec. of using this skill to select the type of pact you want to accept.\nCooldown: 1 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, when your HP reaches 0, <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/final-pact.png} tip={Final Pact (4th Job)}> will be activated when available based on your chosen pact
details: Upon pressing the Skill Key, you will be given 3 choices that can be chosen by pressing the corresponding Arrow Key
Choices will allow for shorter or longer invincibility durations however, the conditions to reduce cooldown and the cooldown itself will also differ
While toggled, pressing the Skill Key again will toggle off the buff

primary.name: Final Pact
primary.shortDesc:
Fully restores your HP and MP when the effect activates. Invincibility effect activates based on the type selected in Accept Final Pact.
Lesser Pact: Invincibility duration: 2 sec. Cooldown will shorten by 70 sec. if you defeat 24 enemies or attack a boss during the 10 sec. after invincibility activates.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
Moderate Pact: Invincibility duration: 8 sec. Cooldown will shorten by 80 sec. if you defeat 44 enemies or attack a boss during the 20 sec. after invincibility activates.
Cooldown: 260 sec.
Greater Pact: Invincibility duration: 40 sec. Cooldown will shorten by 300 sec. if you defeat 52 enemies or attack a boss during the 40 sec. after invincibility activates.
Cooldown: 900 sec.
[Passive Effects: When HP is 20% or above, Final Damage: +30%, Speed: +20, Critical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +15%]
primary.desc: When your HP reaches 0, fully restores HP and MP while granting invinciblity and your attacks ignore Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage, %Crit Rate, %Crit Damage and grants flat Movement Speed when your %Max HP is above a certain threshold
Defeating a set amount of enemies or attacking a boss a set number of times within a given duration will reduce the skill's cooldown
Based on the chosen Pact, the duration of the buff and the conditions to reduce the cooldown and the cooldown itself will differ

primary.name: Dark Resonance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 85, Duration: 30 sec., restores 100% of Max HP immediately upon casting, Final Damage: +8%, Ignore Defense: +10%, Boss Damage: +15%\nCooldown: 70 sec., direct skill attacks reduce cooldown by 0.35 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Ignore Defense: +30%]
primary.desc: Restores %Max HP and increases %Final Damage, %Ignore DEF and %Boss Damage
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF
Direct skill attacks will reduce the cooldown slightly

primary.name: Magic Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Success Rate: 100%, Buff Block Duration: 22 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs
details: Enemies affected by Magic Crash cannot be affected again for a short period

Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Revenge of the Evil Eye
primary.shortDesc:
When the Dark Knight personally attacks, Damage: 309%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5
Cooldown: 5 sec
Evil Eye Shock III: Damage: 630%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 7. After the attacks, unleash 4 condensed auras of darkness, which deal 423% damage up to 3 enemies 5 times.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
primary.desc: Periodically when you attack, Evil Eye will also attack the enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/evil-eye-shock.png} tip={Evil Eye Shock (2nd Job)}> and the attack will now fire out 4 damaging shockwaves
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 25 sec, ATT: +50, Recover 9% of Max HP when attacking.\nCooldown: 90 sec

hyperActive.name: Nightshade Explosion
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 10, Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 10 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes an explosion around you that damages nearby enemies
details: Can use used without casting animation when used during <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/spear-of-darkness.png} tip={Spear of Darkness (5th Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Spear of Darkness
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350. A summoned spear deals 875% damage 7 times on up to 12 enemies. For attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the target's Max HP, Damage -10% (while you're preparing to throw the spear).
Attacks only one enemy up to 9 times.
Critical Rate: +100%. Ignores 50% Enemy DEF.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Hurls a spear forward that pierces through enemies
details: While casting, gain increased %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks
The spear can be directed using the Up and Down Arrow Keys
Attack has increased Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
Attack can only hit a single enemy up to 9 times
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Radiant Evil
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, An Evil Eye appears in front of you, attacking up to 10 enemies 6 times, dealing 260% damage for 3 sec, and ignoring 20% additional enemy Defense.\nCooldown: 20 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Evil Eye transforms into a giant eye that pulsates damaging nearby enemies
details: Only usable while Evil Eye is summoned
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Calamitous Cyclone
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100. Deals 800% damage 8 times consecutively on up to 12 enemies for up to 4 sec. Recover 1% of max HP for every attack that lands. Attacks up to 26 times.
When key is released, activates a shockwave 8 times that deals 15 final attack(s) with 1700% damage to a max of 12 enemies. Recover 10% of max HP for every final attack that lands.
All Calamitous Cyclone hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +100%, and Addition Monster Def Ignored: +50%
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, unleash a flurry of strikes forward
details: At the end of the attack, launch a final spear that deals heavy damage<bp_Attack is unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect_>
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Darkness Aura
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000. Periodically attack up to 3 enemies with 880% damage 5 times over 40 sec. Recover 3% of max HP per attack and obtain 1 Life Force. If HP recovery exceeds Max HP, gain an HP shield amounting to 75% of the recovery amount. Max Life Force: 10, Max Shield: 30% of Max HP. Periodically generates a maximum-strength shield. Damage Taken -10% (includes damage proportional to Max HP).\nReusing this skill can instantly trigger a dark slash that strikes 8 enemies for 1350% damage 13 times, plus an additional 1 slashes for each 1 Life Force possessed.\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, periodically attack enemies which recovers %Max HP and generates 1 Life Force (up to 10)
details: When HP is full, grants an HP shield based on the amount that was supposed to be recovered<bp_Periodically also grants a maximum-strength shield_>
While active, increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attack

Pressing the Skill Key again unleashes a one-time attack based on how much Life Force was accumulated<bp_Attack has no casting animation when used during <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/gungnirs-descent.png} tip={Gungnir's Descent (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/nightshade-explosion.png} tip={Nightshade Explosion (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/calamitous-cyclone.png} tip={Calamitous Cyclone (5th Job)}>_>
In 6th Job, using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/dark-knight/dead-space.png} tip={Dead Space (6th Job)}> will grant maximum stacks of Life Force
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

originSkill.name: Dead Space
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting\nChase Cuts occur 6 times which attack up to 15 enemies with 1200% damage 6 times, after that 58 Gate(s) of Darkness are released to attack up to 15 enemies with 1035% damage 14 times\nCooldown: 360 seconds

meta: Dark Knight is a STR warrior class part of the Explorers. Dark Knight utilizes Spears and Polearms as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Dark Knight can equip Iron Chains
